~Sprint~.Upgrade: If you are Slowed, move only 1 meter.
~Sprint~.Notes: When you Sprint, you can move even if you already moved this turn. You can not Sprint if you are Rooted.
~Sprint~.Name: ~Sprint~

~Improvised Attack~.Effect: Attack with or throw an object for 1d4 + ^Might^ or ^Dexterity^ (Slash, Smash or Pierce Damage, depending on the object).
~Improvised Attack~.Notes:
You can attack with a body part if within 1 meter. Considered weapon Attacks.
For monsters, this takes 1 Action and deals only 1d4 Damage.
~Improvised Attack~.Name: ~Improvised Attack~

~Intimidating Mock~.Effect: A Unit that can see or hear you becomes Fumbling.
~Intimidating Mock~.Name: ~Intimidating Mock~

~Push~.Effect: Push a non-Epic, max medium-sized Unit 1 meter in any direction you choose.
~Push~.Name: ~Push~

~Taunt~.Effect: Choose a Unit. Its next offensive Act gets -2 if it's not on you.
~Taunt~.Name: ~Taunt~

~Examine Monster~.Effect: Choose a Worthy Unit to examine. You get a small description and a general idea of its gimmicks. Might require a Check for certain monsters.
~Examine Monster~.Notes: The Quest Master may tell you the the first part of a monster's description (e.g. Koblods always dodge the first incoming attack). For some monsters, it is up to the Quest Master whether they ask for a Check.
~Examine Monster~.Name: ~Examine Monster~

~Grapple~.Effect: Pass a Might Check against a Unit's Dexterity or Might Check (its choice) to either make it Rooted and Fumbling, or mount it.
~Grapple~.Notes: Like all Crowd Control, being grappled lasts 1 turn. The target becomes not-grappled if the grappler exits its adjacency.
~Grapple~.Name: ~Grapple~

~Hack and Slash~.Effect:
Your next {Effect}
~Click on the Icon to select a preferred effect!~
~Hack and Slash~.Notes:
Roll the attack only once.
Weapon effects (like Critical Strikes), if necessary, are applied to the main target only.

Variants.Name: Hack and Slash
Variants.Effect: melee 2-handed weapon attack also hits all other Units 1 meter from you, but deals -50% Damage to them (deals normal Damage to the main target).

Variants.Name: Slice and Dice
Variants.Effect: melee 1-handed weapon attack also hits all other Units 1 meter from you.

Variants.Name: Lock and Load
Variants.Effect: ranged 2-handed weapon attack also hits all other Units 1 meter from the main target, but deals -50% Damage to them (deals normal Damage to the main target).

Variants.Name: Point and Shoot
Variants.Effect: ranged 1-handed weapon attack also hits all other Units 1 meter from the main target.

~Hack and Slash~.Name: ~Hack and Slash~

~Recuperate~.Effect: Heal yourself for 1d10. If you're affected by any Crowd Control (except turn-skipping), remove it instead of healing.
~Recuperate~.Name: ~Recuperate~

~Painful Puncture~.Effect: Attack a Unit for 1d6 + 2 Damage of your ^weapon^'s type. Its Passives, weapon* effects and Reactions are disabled until your next turn.
~Painful Puncture~.Notes: Its Passives become disabled before you hit it (e.g. Kobolds don't dodge this attack). Some monsters have special weapon* effects, like Centaurs who gain extra Damage based on how much they moved. These are disabled.
~Painful Puncture~.Name: ~Painful Puncture~

~Off-Hand Shank~.Effect: Make 3 attacks with a weapon you haven't used this turn that would normally scale with a Stat. These attacks do not add your Stat to the Damage.
~Off-Hand Shank~.Name: ~Off-Hand Shank~

~Vault Break~.Effect:
Slam the ground so hard that it shatters one obstacle that fits within a 3x3x3 meter area.
After casting this Ability, if you moved this turn, you can continue your movement.
~Vault Break~.Notes: It is the Quest Master's call if an obstacle can be broken. Most walls may not be broken, except for thinner ones and fences.
~Vault Break~.Name: ~Vault Break~

~Chilling Shout~.Effect:
Deal 12 + Charisma Cold Damage to a sentient Unit
It becomes Slowed.
~Chilling Shout~.Notes: Doesn't work on Units that can't feel fear.
~Chilling Shout~.Name: ~Chilling Shout~

~Panic Lash~.Effect: A target within 3 meters takes 3d4 + 2 Psychic Damage and can't cast Healing spells or regain Health for 1 turn.
~Panic Lash~.Name: ~Panic Lash~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee Attack a target on the same line, the Attack gains +1 for every 3 meters moved in the straight line.
~Bull Rush~.Notes: Works if mounted or if using Abilities that dash or jump (in a straight line), but teleporting interrupts this.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Muscle Tear~.Effect: Deal 1d10 Pulse Damage to a Unit and it becomes Feared.
~Muscle Tear~.Name: ~Muscle Tear~

~Blood Foment~.Effect:
Use when a Unit wants to make multiple Attacks on the same turn, or use a non-area Ability that hits multiple targets (e.g. Magic Missiles).
That Unit takes 1d4 Psychic Damage and is limted to only 1 Attack or hit with that Ability.
~Blood Foment~.Note: E.g. when a Strigoi wants to make 3 Attacks on its turn (before it rolls the 2nd and 3rd Attacks), use Blood Foment on it and it will only be able to do one Attack. Or, when someone casts Magic Missiles, use Blood Foment and only one missile will fire.
~Blood Foment~.Name: ~Blood Foment~

~FURY~.Effect:
Gain 3 Fury.
Every time you do Damage or Healing, deal Damage or Heal an extra amount equal to your Fury, then get -1 Fury.
~FURY~.Name: ~FURY~

~Snap Out Of It~.Effect: Attack a different Unit with a 1-handed weapon. It heals instead of dealing Damage.
~Snap Out Of It~.Notes: Any extra Damage effects on it heal as well (e.g. Smite, Cursewielder, etc).
~Snap Out Of It~.Name: ~Snap Out Of It~

~Lance Heave~.DisplayRequirement: Only usable if it hits at least 2 Units
~Lance Heave~.Effect:
Make a {Weapon} ^weapon^ attack {Effect}
~Click on the Icon to select a preferred effect!~
~Lance Heave~.Upgrade: Can apply weapon effects. If the weapon effect requires a target, applies to one chosen Unit hit.
~Lance Heave~.Notes: Range increases do increase the length. The Damage must the same for all Units hit. All bonuses to the attack (e.g. Smite, Cursewielder, etc) also split evenly.

Variants.Name: Lance Heave
Variants.Effect: that hits all Units in a 3-meter long line. The Damage is evenly split among all hit Units, ignores Defense, and they all become Slowed.

Variants.Name: Blade Heave
Variants.Effect: that hits all Units in a 3-meter long line. The Damage is evenly split among all hit Units, ignores Defense, and they all become Slowed.

Variants.Name: Penetrating Heave
Variants.Effect: that hits one more Unit up to 2 meters directly behind the main target.

Variants.Name: Piercing Heave
Variants.Effect: that hits one more Unit up to 2 meters directly behind the main target.

~Lance Heave~.Name: ~Lance Heave~

~Glory Shout~.Effect: Roll 1d4. Either heal all allies that can hear you (and yourself), or Damage all Worthy Enemies that can hear you for that amount (as Psychic Damage).
~Glory Shout~.Name: ~Glory Shout~

~Chilling Shout~.Effect:
Deal 12 + Charisma Cold Damage to a sentient Unit
It becomes Slowed.
~Chilling Shout~.Notes: Doesn't work on Units that can't feel fear.
~Chilling Shout~.Name: ~Chilling Shout~

~Bull Rush~.Effect: If you move at least 3 meters in a straight line and then melee Attack a target on the same line, the Attack gains +1 for every 3 meters moved in the straight line.
~Bull Rush~.Notes: Works if mounted or if using Abilities that dash or jump (in a straight line), but teleporting interrupts this.
~Bull Rush~.Name: ~Bull Rush~

~Sword and Board~.Effect: Use when a Worthy Enemy attacks you and you take no Damag. Attack it back for 1d6 Damage if it's within your equipped ^weapon^'s range.
~Sword and Board~.Name: ~Sword and Board~

~Tactical Aim~.Effect: If you did not use a ^weapon^ last Turn, after your first ^weapon^ attack this Turn, you can reroll all the dice (together) if you didn't like the result.
~Tactical Aim~.Upgrade: Only works from the 2nd Round of combat on.
~Tactical Aim~.Notes: An Ability counts as using a ^weapon^ if the word ^weapon^ appears in its text. Can reroll attack bonuses like Smite, Cursewielder, etc. Only the final roll applies effects if any. Body parts in melee are considered weapons.
~Tactical Aim~.Name: ~Tactical Aim~

~Gladiator Grandeur~.Effect: Push an enemy 1 meter in any direction. Gain {Gold}Fool's Gold equal to the enemy's Experience Worth.
~Gladiator Grandeur~.Upgrade: Epic Monsters award {Gold}Fool's Gold equal to their Experience Worth / Epic Grade.
~Gladiator Grandeur~.Notes:
Fool's Gold is an imaginary currency that can be converted to real Gold by spending 1 hour in a town or city.
Fool's Gold lasts until converted to real Gold.
~Gladiator Grandeur~.Name: ~Gladiator Grandeur~

~Doublesault~.Effect: Leap up to 3 meters. If you land on a Unit, Doublesault again (for free)!
~Doublesault~.Notes:
You leap from Unit to Unit until you no longer land on a Unit. You can't leap on the same Unit twice. If you land on a Unit, you must leap again.
You can use this even while in the air and it cancels out your current fall or acceleration.
~Doublesault~.Name: ~Doublesault~

~Stand Stoic~.Effect:
All allies (and you) remove their Roots, Slows and Dazes.
You (yourself) can continue your Movement if you already moved.
~Stand Stoic~.Name: ~Stand Stoic~

~Infailible Reach~.Effect:
Pass a Dexterity Check against a Unit's current Initiative.
If you succeed, deal 4d10 Damage of an equipped ^weapon^'s type.
~Infailible Reach~.Notes: Can apply attack bonuses like Smite, Cursewielder, magic weapon extra Damage, etc.
~Infailible Reach~.Name: ~Infailible Reach~

~Row Through~.Effect:
Push a medium-sized, non-Epic Unit up to 6 meters in any direction.
If it collides with something, it is Stunned and takes 1d8 Smash Damage (and it stops).
If it collided with another Unit, that Unit is also pushed in the same direction and repeats the effect of Row Through.
~Row Through~.Notes:
E.g. if it collides with a Unit, that Unit is also pushed up to 6 meters and if it collides with something, it is Stunned and takes 1d8 Damage. If that thing it collided with was a Unit, that Unit is also pushed up to 6 meters and is Stunned and so on.
"{Stunned}"
~Row Through~.Name: ~Row Through~

~Whirlwind~.Upgrade: The Ability is Whirlwind if a melee weapon is equipped, or Rain Death if a ranged weapon is equipped.
~Whirlwind~.Notes:
Each rolled die must be assigned to a Unit.
The Damage type depends on the weapon currently equipped. Doesn't apply weapon effects (the weapon only matters for the Damage type).

Variants.Name: Rain Death
Variants.Area: in a chosen 5x5 meter area (5 meter range to the edge).

~Whirlwind~.Name: ~Whirlwind~

~Assess Their Ranks~.Effect:
Gain Shielding equal to the number of Worthy Enemies you can see.
At the start of your next turn, all Shielding on you is consumed and explodes, dealing Pulse Damage equal to the Shielding consumed to all Units within 1 meter of you.
~Assess Their Ranks~.Name: ~Assess Their Ranks~

~Bravery Despite Fear~.Effect: Reset the Cooldown of a different Ability.
~Bravery Despite Fear~.Name: ~Bravery Despite Fear~

~Element Burst~.Effect:
Damage a Unit for 2d6 {Element} Damage.
If had taken {Element} Damage this combat before, add another 1d10 Damage.
~Click on the Spell Icon to select the preferred Element!~
~Element Burst~.Name: ~Element Burst~

~Burning Breath~.Effect:
All Units 3x3 meter area take 4 Fire Damage.
Units can't benefit from Cover from this Ability.
~Burning Breath~.Upgrade: At Level 4, this has no Cooldown.
~Burning Breath~.Name: ~Burning Breath~

~Rime Shackles~.Effect: Deal Cold Damage to a Unit equal to 2d6 + ^Its Dexterity^. If it's Medium or smaller, it becomes Rooted.
~Rime Shackles~.Name: ~Rime Shackles~

~Volt Guard~.Effect: Use when a Unit would take Damage (after roll). Reduce the incoming Damage by 50%, and shock the Unit back for 1d4 Shock Damage.
~Volt Guard~.Name: ~Volt Guard~

~Ice Shard~.Effect: Shoot an ice shard toward a Unit, dealing 1d8 + 3 Cold or Pierce Damage (your choice). It becomes Fumbling.
~Ice Shard~.Name: ~Ice Shard~

~Element Enchantment~.Effect:
Choose a metallic weapon to imbue it with {Element}.
That weapon deals +2 Damage (as part of the Attack) and the total weapon Damage becomes {Element} Damage.

~Click on the Spell Icon to select the preferred Element!~
~Element Enchantment~.Upgrade: Lasts until the end of the next (or current) combat, or for up to 24 hours.
~Element Enchantment~.Notes: Does not stack with other weapon enchantments from Spells. These are considered different Spells.
~Element Enchantment~.Name: ~Element Enchantment~

~Heat Metal~.Effect:
Choose a piece of metal equipment and heat it.
- If it's an armor, the wearer takes 5d4 Fire Damage.
- If it's a weapon, the wearer takes 1d10 Damage. If you rolled higher than its Might, it becomes Crippled.
~Heat Metal~.Name: ~Heat Metal~

~Conduit Flow~.Effect:
Choose a Worthy Unit other than you.
If it's an Enemy, it takes 1d10 Shock Damage.
Otherwise, it is Healed for 1d8.
If there is another Unit within 2 meters of it, repeat Conduit Flow on the new Unit (you choose if multiple).
~Conduit Flow~.Notes: Each Unit can be affected by Conduit Flow only once per cast. Cover is calculated from Unit to Unit (as if the conduit is jumping from Unit to Unit). The conduit can be repeated on you as long as you're not the first target.
~Conduit Flow~.Name: ~Conduit Flow~

~Control Elements~.Effect:
Target a 1 meter cube containing Fire, Earth (dirt) or Water.
Choose any of the following to do with it:
{Diamond} Move it (or spread it if fire) up to 5 meters in any direction
{Diamond} Destroy it
{Diamond} Lower or increase its temperature (or light emission) by 50%
{Diamond} Roughly its shape and/or color
~Control Elements~.Notes:
When moving earth or water, it can hold up to 20gk of mass in/on it. Otherwise it can't be moved. Units affected can take up to 1d8 Damage if the circumstances are right.
Water is Hard Terrain. Normal Fire Damage is 2 when stepping on it
Apply common sense. The QM has the final word on whether something is possible.
~Control Elements~.Name: ~Control Elements~

~Searing Arrows~.Effect: Shoot 3 rays of fire (at one or more Units). Each does 1d6 + 2 Fire Damage.
~Searing Arrows~.Notes: You can roll them one by one, after they deal the damage.
~Searing Arrows~.Name: ~Searing Arrows~

~Lightning Chord~.Effect:
Shock a Unit for 1d10 Shock Damage.
At the start of your every turn, deal another 1d10 to it.
The effect is broken if you end your turn more than 5 meters away from it.
~Lightning Chord~.Upgrade: A Unit can only be affected by one Lightning Chord at a time.
~Lightning Chord~.Name: ~Lightning Chord~

~Frost Nova~.Effect:
All Units within 2 meters of you become Slowed and take 1d6 Cold Damage.
For each Unit hit, you deal +1 Cold Damage for the rest of the encounter.
~Frost Nova~.Name: ~Frost Nova~

~Element Rune~.Effect:
Place a rune on a smooth solid surface. 
A Unit touching the rune detonates it, dealing 3d10 {Element} Damage to it.
Make an Intelligence Check against that Unit's Might Check. If you pass, {ExtraEffect}.

~Click on the Spell Icon to select the preferred Element!~

Variants.ExtraEffect: ~also deal 50% of the Damage to all Units within 2 meters of the rune's position~
~the Unit is pushed 5 meters away from the rune's position~

~Element Rune~.Name: ~Element Rune~

~Chain Thunder~.Effect:
Extend a lightning bolt upon a  Unit, dealing for 2d12 Shock Damage to it and its closest Unit within 3 meters.
If the lightning touches water, fire, fog or gas (or Unit is standing in it), increase the Damage by 50%.
~Chain Thunder~.Name: ~Chain Thunder~

~Freeze Water~.Effect:
Choose a number of 1x1x1 cubes containing water equal to your Level.
The water there freezes.
If a Unit is caught in the water, pass an Intelligence Check against its Dexterity Check to make it Rooted. If you fail, it is expelled to a nearby space near the frozen water (it chooses, within reason).
~Freeze Water~.Name: ~Freeze Water~

~Blazetrail~.Effect: A Unit gains propulsion by fire. It gains +3 Movement Speed, can Break Movement and, whenever it enters the adjacency of an Enemy, deals 1d4 Fire Damage to it.
~Blazetrail~.Notes: The Damage can only happen once per turn per enemy. The Damage source is you (for amplification effects).
~Blazetrail~.Name: ~Blazetrail~

~Frostfall~.Effect:
Choose a Unit. It takes 1d10 Cold Damage, and each Unit within 2 meters of it takes Cold Damage equal to 200% of the roll. All of them are Slowed.
If there were no Units within 2 meters of it, the target is Stunned instead.
~Frostfall~.Upgrade: When Stunning a flying target, it remains stuck in the air (levitating) for up to 6 seconds.
~Frostfall~.Name: ~Frostfall~

~Element Ball~.Effect:
All Units in 6-meter diameter area take 6d6 {Element} Damage.

~Click on the Spell Icon to select the preferred Element!~
~Element Ball~.Notes: Cover is calculated from the center of the area.
~Element Ball~.Name: ~Element Ball~

~Ice Spike~.Effect:
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, it takes 3d8 + 9 Cold Damage, or half otherwise.
The target automatically fails if it's affected by any Crowd Control (except Hard Terrain).
~Ice Spike~.Name: ~Ice Spike~

~Ignition~.Effect:
Ignite a Unit you can see. At the end of each of your turns, it takes 7 Fire Damage.
Its ignition ends if the Unit is Damaged by Cold, Shock or Acid or is splashed with water.
~Ignition~.Name: ~Ignition~

~Elating Jolt~.Effect:
If your last cast Spell was shock-themed, give a Unit Shielding equal to your Charisma and they regain 1 Mana.
Otherwise, set a Unit's Defense to 0 and deal 1d6 Shock Damage to it.
~Elating Jolt~.Upgrade: Only usable in a Worthy Combat encounter.
~Elating Jolt~.Name: ~Elating Jolt~

~Prismatic Convergence~.Effect: Damage a Unit for a total of 2d6 True Damage for each Element the target had been Damaged with this combat before.
~Prismatic Convergence~.Upgrade: Possible elements are Fire, Cold, Shock, Divine, Poison, Scourge, Acid and Psychic.
~Prismatic Convergence~.Name: ~Prismatic Convergence~

~Magic Missiles~.Effect: Shoot a number of missiles equal to ^your Intelligence^ + 1. Each missile does 1d4 Pulse Damage.
~Magic Missiles~.Notes:
Missiles are rolled at the same time. Then you can decide which die Damages which Unit.
Each missile is a separate Attack and can be affected individually by Cover, Fumbling, etc (e.g. shooting all 3 missiles at a Unit that has Cover makes each missile deal 1d4 - 2 Damage).
~Magic Missiles~.Name: ~Magic Missiles~

~Magic Tricks~.Effect:
Choose one of these effects to cast:
{Diamond} Create harmless sensory effects, sparks or non-damaging heat or cold.
{Diamond} Channel to create simple, small, harmless illusions in your hand or within 3 meters.
{Diamond} Instantly clean or soil objects.
{Diamond} Control a quill with telekinesis to quickly write with it.
~Magic Tricks~.Name: ~Magic Tricks~

~Dispel Magic~.Effect: Dispell all ongoing _non-chronic_ magical effects on a Unit (any magical Crowd Control, magical buffs and debuffs, etc).
~Dispel Magic~.Notes: Chronic effects are ones that last days, months or are permanent, such as curses, vampirism, etc.
~Dispel Magic~.Name: ~Dispel Magic~

~Focus Fling~.Effect:
Choose a medium-sized object within 5 meters that's no heaveier than 10kg.
Fling the object into a Unit within 3 meters of the object.
Deals 1d8 Smash Damage.
~Focus Fling~.Upgrade: You can use this to fling consumables like bombs, vials of acid, magic ammo, flasks of holy water, etc. If you do this, the Damage is added as part of the Attack.
~Focus Fling~.Notes:
Cover is applied from the object's initial position to the target.
If the object can break, it breaks. Obviously, the object must be move-able and not tied/stuck in place.
Throwing weapons does not apply effects or deal extra Damage.
~Focus Fling~.Name: ~Focus Fling~

~Longblade~.Effect:
Magically extend the weapon of a willing ally you can see (or yourself) to up to 3 meters.
Its Attacks with that weapon can have up to 3 meters range.
~Longblade~.Name: ~Longblade~

~Flash~.Effect: Instantly teleport up to 6 meters away, within line of sight.
~Flash~.Notes: You take with you all items carried. Does not work if you're Rooted or stuck in place somehow.
~Flash~.Name: ~Flash~

~Feather Fall~.Effect:
Up to 2 Units you choose will start falling gently, down to 3 meters per round.
Once the fall finishes, the spell effect ends.
~Feather Fall~.Notes:
Arcane Feathers can be bought in most towns.
For faster gameplay, you can spend 10 gold when casting the spell, and buy the feather later.
~Feather Fall~.Name: ~Feather Fall~

~North Star~.Effect: You conjure a magical star that always shoots North and deals 4d8 Shock Damage to the first Unit hit.
~North Star~.Notes:
You can only shoot the star towards North - without an angle.
Ask the DM which way North is (if your character knows that).
~North Star~.Name: ~North Star~

~Spectral Hand~.Effect:
Conjure a spectral hand in a space you can see.
You can move the hand as you move your normal hands and you can move your hand by spending meters from your remaining Movement.
The hand can't deal Damage and disappears if it goes outside a 10 meters range.
~Spectral Hand~.Notes:
The hand can't lift objects weighing more than 10kg.
Moving the hand spends Actions as if you made moved your own hand.
Once / turn, you can summon or vanish the hand for 0 Actions if it's effect is still active, in a space next to you.
~Spectral Hand~.Name: ~Spectral Hand~

~Arrow Barrage~.Effect:
You conjure a levitating barrage of arrows in a 3x3 area, up to 10 meters above ground.
At any point (for 0 Actions or with a Reaction), you can release these arrows upon the ground, hitting all enemies hit for 2d6 Pierce Damage.
At the start of your every turn, if the barrage is not yet released, it increases by 1 meter in size in all directions and gains 1d4 Damage when it will be released (up to +3d4 and 9x9).
~Arrow Barrage~.Notes:
E.g. every turn, it goes from 3x3 to 5x5, then 7x7, then 9x9, etc and deals from 2d6 Damage to 2d6 + 1d4, then 2d6 + 2d4, etc.
The arrows disappear as soon as they hit ground, or when dismissed (all at once) for free at any point, or after 1 minute of staying in the air.
~Arrow Barrage~.Name: ~Arrow Barrage~

~Arcane Spear~.Effect:
Shoot a magical spear in a 6 meter line from in front of you.
Each Unit hit takes 14 Damage, except the last Unit hit, which takes only 7 Damage instead.
Each Person or _Magical_ Unit killed by the Arcane Spear refunds you 1 Mana.
~Arcane Spear~.Notes:
A Magical Unit is one that use a form of magic or are themselves fueled through magic (e.g. Dragons, Unicorns, Elementals, etc are magical; Hippogriffs, Naga Warriors and Gnolls are not magical). Apply common sense.
If you only hit one target, it deals 7 Damage.
~Arcane Spear~.Name: ~Arcane Spear~

~Countermagic~.Effect:
Use when a Unit you can see wants to cast a Spell.
It becomes Silenced this turn and must choose something else to do.
~Countermagic~.Upgrade: Each combat, you can only Countermagic each Unit once.
~Countermagic~.Name: ~Countermagic~

~Major Illusion~.Effect:
You create an illusion that fits at most in a 2x2x2 meter cube.
The illusion appears real to the eyes, ears and by smell, but physical interaction makes it obvious it's an illusion and objects pass through it normally.
The illusion can deal no Damage or Crowd Control, but can provide Cover or block Line of Sight (both from the front, and from behind).
On your turn, you can and must spend 1 Action to keep and/or move the illusion, otherwise it is dispelled.
You can only have 1 illusion active at a time.
~Major Illusion~.Upgrade:
At Level 8, the illusion lasts indefinitely until you cancel it without needing to spend Actions, and it can hold its own simple movement and clockwork-like routines.
You can also program this illusion to react on its own in a specific way to specific triggers, but the instructions must be concise - talk with your QM about this.
~Major Illusion~.Name: ~Major Illusion~

~Conjure Object~.Effect:
You can conjure an object that is up to 1x1x1 meter in size.
The object is solid and glows faintly.
You can't conjure mechanical objects.
The object disappears after 1 hour (24 hours at Level 8).
~Conjure Object~.Name: ~Conjure Object~

~Animated Weapon~.Effect:
Conjure a levitating, self-wielding melee weapon on a space within 3 meters.
On your each turn (includig this), the weapon can make a melee Attack that deals 1d10 + 1 Damage (Pierce, Slash or Smash) and move up to 3 meters.
~Animated Weapon~.Upgrade: The weapon lasts until it can't make an attack on a Worthy Unit (it disappears at the end of the turn if it couldn't make an attack on a Worthy Unit).
~Animated Weapon~.Notes:
It costs 1 Action and 1 Mana to summon the weapon. Then, the weapon can Attack once for free every turn (including this), without costing an Action or Mana.
The weapon has no special effect and has 1 Health and 5 Defense.
~Animated Weapon~.Name: ~Animated Weapon~

~Invisibility~.Effect:
You become invisible for up to (Intelligence) minutes (at least 1).
Attacking, taking Damage or casting _offensive_ Abilities while invisible breaks the invisibility.
~Invisibility~.Name: ~Invisibility~

~Polymorph~.Effect:
Choose an animal from the Pet List or any critter, such as a sheep, deer, etc.
A Unit within 10 meters becomes transformed into that animal. Last a number of its turns equal to Your Intelligence - Its Intelligence (at least 1).
~Polymorph~.Upgrade:
The Unit can retain its Health and Defense, but can't do any non-animal actions.
It can do Animal Attack for 1d6 Damage if it's an enemy, or 1d6 + Sense Damage if it's an ally.
~Polymorph~.Notes:
Cover is applied normally.
A Unit can willingly fail the Check. For enemies, aside from Health and Defense, apply rules for Shapeshift. Allies can apply normal rules for Shapeshift (e.g. gain extra Health from the animal).
If used on an Enemy, this is considered Crowd Control.
~Polymorph~.Name: ~Polymorph~

~Lag~.Effect:
Declare a 5x5 meter area.
All Units inside it must succeed an Intelligence Check against double your Intelligence or be affected by all the following:
{Diamond} They are Slowed and Fumbling
{Diamond} They can only make one Attack on their next turn
{Diamond} They can't make Reactions
{Diamond} They can't be invisible
{Diamond} They can't inflict Crowd Control
Lasts until the start of your next turn.
~Lag~.Notes: Ignores Cover for the Intelligence Check. {Slowed} {Fumbling}
~Lag~.Name: ~Lag~

~Levitate~.Effect:
First, roll 2d100. That's how many kilograms you can levitate when you cast this.
You can levitate one object you can see that remains within 10 meters of you.
You can slowly move the object vertically, 1 meter for each 2 of your movement points spent to levitate.
If you use this on an enemy, it must fail a Might Check to be levitated, and can repeat the Check at the end of each of its turns.
A levitated Unit counts as Rooted.
Losing concentration (taking Damage or being Crowd Controlled) instantly starts slowly dropping the target and breaks the Levitate.
~Levitate~.Upgrade: At Level 8, the amount increases to 5d100.
~Levitate~.Name: ~Levitate~

~Grow or Shrink~.Effect:
A Unit or object you can see becomes one Size larger/smaller for its next 1d4 turns.
It gains or loses 20% of its base (unbuffed) Defense (gain/loss is rounded up), gains or loses 1 Damage on all physical Acts (that would deal Damage) and gains or loses 1 Movement Speed.
Can stack multiple times.
~Grow or Shrink~.Notes:
Sizes are Minuscule, Small, Medium, Large, and Larger.
A larger Unit becomes 1 meter larger/smaller in both directions.
It's number of spaces occupied also changes with this.
~Grow or Shrink~.Name: ~Grow or Shrink~

~Reverse Gravity~.Effect:
Declare an area with a diameter in meters (in all directions) equal to your Level.
The gravity becomes reversed in that area and all Units instantly fall upwards. Units can make a Dexterity Check to grab onto an object to not be lifted.
Units suffer fall Damage if they fall onto a ceiling.
When the effect ends, all Units fall at half velocity (and take half of the fall Damage). The same happens to a Unit if it exits the area.
Lasts for up to 1 minute. You can cancel this effect at will.
~Reverse Gravity~.Notes: Fall Damage is 1d6 for every 2 meters fallen (e.g. 1d6 for 2 and 3 meters, 2d6 for 4 and 5 meters, etc).
~Reverse Gravity~.Name: ~Reverse Gravity~

~Alteration~.Effect: Your next Spell within 1 minute Heals instead of dealing Damage, and deals Damage instead of Healing.
~Alteration~.Name: ~Alteration~

~Banishment Slip~.Effect:
A non-Epic Unit becomes Banished to the Shadow Realm until the start of your next turn.
While Banished, it can't interact with the normal world and nothing can interact with it.
~Banishment Slip~.Notes: The Shadow Realm is a parallel dimension, and people there are sometimes visible from the real world as ghostly apparitions.
~Banishment Slip~.Name: ~Banishment Slip~

~Transmogrification~.Effect:
Touch 2 objects of the same type (e.g. 2 helmets, or 2 arrows, or 2 melee 1-Handed weapons, etc).
You make one of the look like the other.
The change is permanent until the object breaks.
~Transmogrification~.Notes: Upon close inspection of the shape and colors, this is visibly an illusion.
~Transmogrification~.Name: ~Transmogrification~

~Transmute Rock~.Effect:
Touch a 1x1x1 meter cube of rock, mud, sand, etc.
Transform it into rock, mud, sand, etc.
A Unit caught in this effect becomes Rooted.
~Transmute Rock~.Name: ~Transmute Rock~

~Magic Prison~.Effect:
Choose a Unit that has 10% or less Health.
You create a 4x4x4 meter magic cube from which that Unit physically can't walk through, no matter how hard they try.
~Magic Prison~.Name: ~Magic Prison~

~Hearth Recall~.Effect:
At any point, you can freely spend 10 minutes in a place to Bind to it.
When you use this Ability, channel for 10 minutes to teleport all allies (and yourself) within 10 meters of you to the bound place.
You can only have 1 bound place at a time.
The range to your bound place must be at most a a number of kilometers equal to your Intelligence * 100.
~Hearth Recall~.Upgrade: At Level 9, you can have up to 2 bound places.
~Hearth Recall~.Notes: You can remove the binding of a place at will, from any distance.
~Hearth Recall~.Name: ~Hearth Recall~

~Conjure Lodge~.Effect:
Conjure a cubic room with a width equal to your Level and a 1x2 meter door.
This room works like a pocket dimension and only the door is visible from the outside. The room occupies no space in the real world, except for the door (you enter the room through the door).
~Conjure Lodge~.Notes: If the Lodge would be destroyed with people inside, each will automatically be expulsed (appear) in a space within 3 meters of the door (randomly or by QM's choice).
~Conjure Lodge~.Name: ~Conjure Lodge~

~Portal~.Effect:
You need a partner who can cast Portal to cast this.
You both cast it at the same time, in different locations.
At the end of the cast time, a portal opens at the locations of the two casters.
Stepping through one of the portals (obviously) teleports the Unit to the other portal.
You can only cast this every 30 days.
~Portal~.Name: ~Portal~

~Alarm~.Effect:
You setup an invisible 4x4x4 meter cube.
If an unknown Unit or Enemy enters the cube, it alerts you mentally.
~Alarm~.Name: ~Alarm~

~Control Elements~.Effect:
Target a 1 meter cube containing Fire, Earth (dirt) or Water.
Choose any of the following to do with it:
{Diamond} Move it (or spread it if fire) up to 5 meters in any direction
{Diamond} Destroy it
{Diamond} Lower or increase its temperature (or light emission) by 50%
{Diamond} Roughly its shape and/or color
~Control Elements~.Notes:
When moving earth or water, it can hold up to 20gk of mass in/on it. Otherwise it can't be moved. Units affected can take up to 1d8 Damage if the circumstances are right.
Water is Hard Terrain. Normal Fire Damage is 2 when stepping on it
Apply common sense. The QM has the final word on whether something is possible.
~Control Elements~.Name: ~Control Elements~

~Control Wind~.Effect:
You can control gusts of wind in a 6x6x6 area and do one of the following for 1 Action:
{Diamond} You can create a gust of Heavy Wind blowing from any direction (see notes) that lasts for 1 minute
{Diamond} You can move a gust of Heavy Wind 3 meters in any direction
{Diamond} You can create wind that makes Units fall softly
{Diamond} You can stop it (for 0 Actions)
~Control Wind~.Notes:
Moving against Heavy Wind acts as Hard Terrain.
Projectiles fired against the Wind have Cover, and projectiles fired with the Wind gain +1.
Heavy Wind also clears Fog, Smoke, etc in the area.
Multiple Winds don't stack into eachother.
~Control Wind~.Name: ~Control Wind~

~Cure Affliction~.Effect: Cure a simple Disease, Debuff or Bleed effect on a Unit (you can choose yourself), or clean up to 2 rations or liters of water of microbes, mild poison or impurities.
~Cure Affliction~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases and poisons.
At level 7, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases and poisons.
~Cure Affliction~.Notes: Debuffs are things like curses, weaknesses, etc. Crowd Control like Daze, Fumbling, Fear, Stun, etc are not considered Debuffs.
~Cure Affliction~.Name: ~Cure Affliction~

~Poison Burst~.Effect:
Choose a Unit and poison it.
At the end of each of your turns, that Unit takes 1d4 Poison Damage.
~Poison Burst~.Notes: You can stack this on the same Unit multiple times.
~Poison Burst~.Name: ~Poison Burst~

~Fog Cloud~.Effect: A 5x5x5 meter cube becomes covered in fog for 1 minute.
~Fog Cloud~.Upgrade: All Attacks done from, through or to Units inside Fog have Cover (-50%).
~Fog Cloud~.Notes: Fog can be dissipated by wind. You can choose the color of the fog. The fog does not go through walls, but does bend around corners (e.g. up to 360 degrees around wall extremities).
~Fog Cloud~.Name: ~Fog Cloud~

~Cutting Winds~.Effect:
A Unit in range takes 2d8 + 3 Slash Damage and ignores Defense.
If it weighs 75kg or less, it takes another 1d8 Slash Damage and is pushed up to 3 meters in a chosen direction.
~Cutting Winds~.Name: ~Cutting Winds~

~Earth Shield~.Effect:
A Unit you can see becomes surrounded by 3 floating plates of earth.
Whenever the Unit would take Damage from an Enemy, it rolls 1d4 and subtracts it from the Damage.
~Earth Shield~.Upgrade: At Level 6, this makes 4 floating plates of earth (4 hits).
~Earth Shield~.Notes: Lasts for 24 hours or until you rolled the d4 3 times. Does not stack multiple times with itself.
~Earth Shield~.Name: ~Earth Shield~

~Lightning Storm~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4x4 Cube.
All units inside take 3d4 Shock Damage now.
If a unit carries anything made of metal or is wet, it 100% more Damage.
On your turn (for up to 1 minute), you can spend 1 Action to move the storm up to 3 meters and (and/or) its deal Damage again.
Lasts up to 1 minute.
~Lightning Storm~.Notes: The storm only deals Damage the moment you spend 1 Action; if you do spend 1 Action, the storm stays in place and deals no Damage.
~Lightning Storm~.Name: ~Lightning Storm~

~Quaking Wave~.Effect:
Send out a 5x1 meter wave forward through the ground.
All Units hit take 2d8 Pulse Damage.
If they are at or below 50% Health, they become Slowed and Fumbling.
~Quaking Wave~.Name: ~Quaking Wave~

~Fairy Fire~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4x4 meter area.
All Units in that area become outlined in a colored glow (you choose the color) and can't benefit from Cover.
~Fairy Fire~.Notes:
The Units glow even through walls, but the denser the walls, the less they appear to glow.
A 1-meter thick concrete wall completely blocks the glow.
This is not considered Crowd Control.
~Fairy Fire~.Name: ~Fairy Fire~

~Draw Moisture~.Effect:
Using your hands, you draw in water from all objects in a 1x1x1 meter cube and store magically it in your body.
You can use 1 Action to release all the stored water, without dealing Damage.
~Draw Moisture~.Upgrade: You can store a number of 1x1x1 meter cubes of water equal to your Level / 2.
~Draw Moisture~.Notes: Just because you target a 1x1x1 meter cube, it doesn't mean you get a 1x1x1 meter cube of water stored. For ease of use, the QM can say you drew in none, a quarter, a half, 3 quarters or a 1x1x1 meter cube of water from the targeted cube.
~Draw Moisture~.Name: ~Draw Moisture~

~Land Breach~.Effect:
You gather stone, dirt, sand, etc from the surroundings and release it upon an enemy.
A Unit takes 3d6 Damage Pulse Damage, then all other Units within 1 meter take Damage equal to two of rolled dice (you choose).
~Land Breach~.Name: ~Land Breach~

~Thorn Quills~.Effect:
A Unit you can see grows thorns on its body.
Whenever it is melee attacked, the attacker takes 1d4 Pierce Damage.
~Thorn Quills~.Notes: A Unit can only be effected by one Thorn Quills effect at a time.
~Thorn Quills~.Name: ~Thorn Quills~

~Venin Shot~.Effect:
A target takes 1d8 + ^Sense^ Poison Damage.
The next time it takes damage from a weapon, it takes an extra 1d8 Poison Damage.
~Venin Shot~.Name: ~Venin Shot~

~Wild Heart~.Effect: Up to 2 allies you touch gain Shielding equal to your Level.
~Wild Heart~.Notes: Wild Heart can only be cast once on a Unit, per Adventure.
~Wild Heart~.Name: ~Wild Heart~

~Wind Chaser~.Effect: Your next ranged Attack curves around obstacles, ignoring Cover and Hard Cover and deals 1d6 extra Damage of its type.
~Wind Chaser~.Notes: You still need Line of Sight to the target.
~Wind Chaser~.Name: ~Wind Chaser~

~Tree Stride~.Effect:
While within 30 meters of trees, you have + 1 Movement Speed.
You can climb trees without rolling Checks, using your normal Movement.
You can use as many meters of your Movement as you like to jump that distance from one tree to another.
~Tree Stride~.Name: ~Tree Stride~

~Fruit of the Forest~.Effect: Roll 3d6. You find and/or enchant that many bites of food. Each bite restores 1 Health to the eater.
~Fruit of the Forest~.Notes: The Health is evenly spread among the food bites. For example, you might conjure 3d6 berries, each worth 1 Health. Or you might enchant a loaf of bread, each slice being worth 1 Health.
~Fruit of the Forest~.Name: ~Fruit of the Forest~

~Locust Swarm~.Effect:
Choose a Unit. A swarm of locusts appears and chases it.
After the Unit moves willingly, it takes 1 Pierce Damage for each meter it moved.
A Unit can only be affected by one Locust Swarm at a time.
~Locust Swarm~.Note: Locust Swarm can be dispelled like any other effect. Damage is done 1 by 1 meter.
~Locust Swarm~.Name: ~Locust Swarm~

~Paralyzing Sting~.Effect:
Lash out a noxious sting towards a Unit.
It chooses whether to be Crippled or take 3d10 Poison Damage.
~Paralyzing Sting~.Name: ~Paralyzing Sting~

~Spider Climb~.Effect:
Your hands and feet can stick to solid surfaces, so you can walk or crawl on them.
Walking on walls and floors acts as Hard Terrain.
~Spider Climb~.Upgrade: Alternatively, you can spend 1 Mana to cast this ignoring the Cooldown.
~Spider Climb~.Name: ~Spider Climb~

~Web~.Effect:
Declare a 4x4 meter area
The area becomes filled with spider web and counts as Difficult Terrain.
After a Unit exits the area, it must succeed a Dexterity Check against 6 + ^Your Sense^ or be Rooted.
~Web~.Name: ~Web~

~Meld With Material~.Effect:
Touch a piece of solid material.
You become unmoving and all of your body becomes as if made from that material.
You can cancel this for free at any point, but until you do, you are Stunned (can't do anything) and have +3 Defense and to all Checks.
~Meld With Material~.Notes:
You still need to drink water and eat food, but don't need to breathe while melded.
This has potential to work like a long term Stealth mechanism.
~Meld With Material~.Name: ~Meld With Material~

~Guidance~.Effect: When an ally makes a Check, it can use your modifiers (including being Skilled in that Skill) instead of its own.
~Guidance~.Name: ~Guidance~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect:
Deal 1d12 + ^Your Sense or Intelligence^ Scourge Damage to a Unit.
For the rest of the combat, whenever it would take Scourge Damage, it takes 2 more (stacks indefinitely).
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Light~.Effect:
Create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 3 meters radius.
It levitates and stays where you put it and can be moved by hand, or you can simply stick it to any solid object.
~Light~.Notes:
You may cancel it with 0 Actions. It can be purposefully destroyed with an Attack.
You choose the color of the light.
The light is not strong enough to blind someone.
The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Mending~.Effect:
Touch a slightly broken piece of material that is still in one piece.
You can repair the Damage done to it.
Mending can repair a piece of Armor or Weapon for 1 Defense or Damage, but no more.
~Mending~.Notes: For example, repair a hole through a chain shirt or textile material, the crack in a piece of glass, etc.
~Mending~.Name: ~Mending~

~Speak With Animals~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, non-hostile animals.
~Speak With Animals~.Notes: Keep in mind that animals generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Animals~.Name: ~Speak With Animals~

~Speak With Plants~.Effect: You can attempt to speak concrete ideas with willing, large plants.
~Speak With Plants~.Notes: Keep in mind that plants generally have low Intelligence, and they are not expected to 'speak' back to you through language.
~Speak With Plants~.Name: ~Speak With Plants~

~Dancing Blade~.Effect: Your melee weapon Attacks have +1 meter range (up to 3 meters), by levitating to your target, hitting them, then quickly returning to your hand.
~Dancing Blade~.Notes:
These Attacks are still considered melee Attacks, and are not considered thrown.
Flanking applies normally if there's an Ally right behind the enemy you're Attacking (forming a line between the 3 of you).
~Dancing Blade~.Name: ~Dancing Blade~

~Restoration~.Effect:
Remove all your party members' Exhaustion (from any source).
If they were Exhausted from lack of sleep, they can resist sleep Exhaustion for 8 more hours.
~Restoration~.Name: ~Restoration~

~Expelling Bolt~.Effect: Shoot a magical bolt towards a Unit that deals 1d10 + (target's base Movement Speed) Pulse Damage to it.
~Expelling Bolt~.Notes: Against Epic monsters, the Maximum Speed is calculated as it's (Speed) * (Epic Grade). E.g. if it's an Ogre with Movement Speed of 3 and has an Epic Grade of 2 (meaning it takes 2 turns), its Maximum Movement Speed is 2 * 3 = 6.
~Expelling Bolt~.Name: ~Expelling Bolt~

~Invigorate~.Effect:
Heal a target for 1d4 + ^Sense^ Health.
After this, if the target is at full Health, repeat this on another target.
~Invigorate~.Notes: Yes, this can chain again and again.
~Invigorate~.Name: ~Invigorate~

~Mind Blast~.Effect: A Unit takes 4d6 Psychic Damage and chooses whether to become Blinded or Silenced.
~Mind Blast~.Name: ~Mind Blast~

~Blur~.Effect:
A Unit you can see (or yourself) becomes blurry to enemies until the start of your next turn.
It gains +2 Defense and +2 to all Resist Checks and 3 Movement Speed.
~Blur~.Upgrade: You can use this as a Reaction when another Unit declares an Attack or Ability (before it makes it).
~Blur~.Name: ~Blur~

~Wild Steed~.Effect:
You call upon a ridable land animal native to the area you are in.
You and up to 1 more party member can ride this animal.
It follows the normal rules for Riding.
It does not participate in combat.
~Wild Steed~.Upgrade: At Level 6, this can be a flying animal.
~Wild Steed~.Name: ~Wild Steed~

~Confusion~.Effect:
Choose 2 Units you can see. Each takes 1d6 + ^Your Sense^ Damage (separately) and is affected by an effect based on the number on the die:
{Diamond} 1. Immediately moves in a random direction (chosen by the DM) (without consumng Movement), and is Feared.
{Diamond} 2. Is Rooted and tries to make a Ranged Attack
{Diamond} 3. Is Blinded
{Diamond} 4. Is Fumbling and forgets to how to do Ranged Attacks
{Diamond} 5. Is Silenced
{Diamond} 5. No effect
~Confusion~.Notes:
If you roll 2 and the Unit can't make a ranged Attack, it does not take any action.
Cover is applied normally.
~Confusion~.Name: ~Confusion~

~Fake Sound~.Effect:
You create a sound out of thin air.
Roll a Charisma Check and add your Intelligence modifier to it to see how accurate your sound is.
~Fake Sound~.Scaling: At Level 4, this lasts up to 1 minute. At level 8, this lasts up to 1 hour.
~Fake Sound~.Name: ~Fake Sound~

~Charming Word~.Effect:
A Unit makes a Sense Check.
If it fails, all your Charisma checks for/against it have +2.
Lasts until the Unit can't see or hear you anymore.
~Charming Word~.Notes: The target can't tell it was affected unless it knows about this type of magic. Cover is applied normally.
~Charming Word~.Name: ~Charming Word~

~Influence Beast~.Effect:
A non-Epic beast that can see you makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, you can change the beast's mood (make it hungry, afraid, nervous, etc).
~Influence Beast~.Name: ~Influence Beast~

~Encode Thoughts~.Effect:
You pull a String of Memory or Thoughts (can be visual, auditive, sensory and olphactive) from your own memory.
This String can be up to 1 minute in length.
It is visible to the eye as an arcane ribbon-like energy.
You can transport this String like you would carry a normal 10x10x10 decimeter object.
To view the String, a person can willingly absorb it through the mouth, eyes, nose, etc (corresponding to the type of memories) and visualize the String.
After that, the String disappears.
Encoding another String makes the previous String disappear.
~Encode Thoughts~.Name: ~Encode Thoughts~

~Soul Comet~.Effect:
Shoot a comet at a Unit that changes in power the longer it travels.
It deals 1d6 Pulse Damage for every meter it travels, but the longer it travels, the weaker the Crowd Control is.
{Diamond} 1 or 2 meters: Target becomes Stunned
{Diamond} 3 or 4 meters: Target becomes Fumbling
{Diamond} 5 or 6 meters: Target becomes Rooted
{Diamond} 7+ meters: Roll an Unstable Spark die
~Soul Comet~.Notes: The Unstable Spark die rolled affects your next Ability this Turn. Good luck with that!
~Soul Comet~.Name: ~Soul Comet~

~Locate Unit~.Effect:
Name or describe a Unit that is familiar to you.
You know the direction towards that Unit and the direction of its movement.
~Locate Unit~.Upgrade: At Level 8, the range of this Spell becomes 10 kilometers.
~Locate Unit~.Notes: You can choose to locate a Unit of a certain type (e.g. a zombie, a human, an elephant) or a specific Unit, as long as you know know what it looks like.
~Locate Unit~.Name: ~Locate Unit~

~Translation~.Effect: You can understand any spoken or written language that's either Common (Dwarvish, Elvish) or Wild (spoken by "wild", tribal socities, such as Orcish, Goblan, Sylvan, etc).
~Translation~.Name: ~Translation~

~Watcher Eye~.Effect:
You conjure a magical eye that records everything it sees for up to 24 hours.
After 24 hours, the eye stops recording.
You can use your magic to scan what the eye recorded in your mind.
At any point, you can tune into the eye and see what it sees in your mind.
~Watcher Eye~.Upgrade: At Level 8, you can move use your movement to instead move the Eye while you're tuned into it (it can fly) and lasts a number of days equal to your Level.
~Watcher Eye~.Name: ~Watcher Eye~

~Water Breathing~.Effect: Up to 2 allies you can see (can include yourself) can now breathe under water.
~Water Breathing~.Name: ~Water Breathing~

~Eldritch Blast~.Effect:
Blast a Unit for 2d8 + ^target's Might^ Scourge Damage.
If you roll maximum on at least one die, deal another 1d6 Damage.
~Eldritch Blast~.Name: ~Eldritch Blast~

~Curse of Weakness~.Effect:
A target makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, whenever it makes an Attack or Check, it rolls 1d4 and subtracts it from the result.
~Curse of Weakness~.Upgrade: Only affects an Epic monster's first turn.
~Curse of Weakness~.Notes: Cover is applied normally to the Charisma Check.
~Curse of Weakness~.Name: ~Curse of Weakness~

~Decaying Blight~.Effect:
Channel to spawn a blight that spreads a 1x1 meter space away from you for each 1 Action channeled.
The blight kills small plants, insects and rots wood and rusts metal. It also makes fertile soil infertile, turns textile and paper materials into dust and decays food and poisons water.
You can channel a number of times (Actions) equal to your Level.
~Decaying Blight~.Upgrade: At Level 5, you can choose to ommit some of the effects of this blight.
~Decaying Blight~.Notes:
This Ability is not meant for combat.
Be creative with how you use this little spell!
~Decaying Blight~.Name: ~Decaying Blight~

~Cloud of Rot~.Effect:
Conjure a 4x4x4 meter cloud of rot.
When a Unit touches the cloud it takes 1d10 Poison Damage, become Fumbling and can't be healed all until the end of their current (or next) turn.
~Cloud of Rot~.Name: ~Cloud of Rot~

~Disenchantment~.Duration: 8 hours (24 hours at level 4, 1 week at level 8)
~Disenchantment~.Effect:
A person makes a Sense Check.
If it fails, it becomes afflicted with a minor (usually non-combat) curse, such as:
{Diamond} Its Initiative is halved (or its Initiative bonus)
{Diamond} The target can't properly tie knots, sew, use keys or pick locks, etc
{Diamond} The target appears less attractive (its Charisma Checks have -3)
{Diamond} Gains runny nose, eyes and sweats more
{Diamond} Stumbles randomly
~Disenchantment~.Notes: A Unit can't be affected by the same Disenchantment effect multiple times.
~Disenchantment~.Name: ~Disenchantment~

~Hollow Touch~.Effect:
Deal 1d12 + ^Your Sense or Intelligence^ Scourge Damage to a Unit.
For the rest of the combat, whenever it would take Scourge Damage, it takes 2 more (stacks indefinitely).
~Hollow Touch~.Name: ~Hollow Touch~

~Thaumaturgy~.Effect:
You create one of the following magical effects:
{Diamond} Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
{Diamond} You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
{Diamond} You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
{Diamond} You cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
{Diamond} You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.
~Thaumaturgy~.Upgrade: At Level 4 you can cast this for Half-Action, and at Level 7, for 0 Actions.
~Thaumaturgy~.Name: ~Thaumaturgy~

~Wyrd Renewal~.Effect:
Roll 1d10 - 5. After you see the result, choose a Unit.
If it's negative, deal Scourge Damage to it. Otherwise, heal it.
~Wyrd Renewal~.Name: ~Wyrd Renewal~

~Summon Familiar~.Effect:
Summon a familiar in a space next to you, that has the aspect of a small demon or animal.
It has 8 Health, 3 Defense, 5 Movement Speed, 0/0/0/0/0 in Stats and takes its turn at the same time as you (and uses your Spell Grade).
On its turn, it has a Half-Action, usable only for Potions, Scrolls and the Push and Taunt Default Moves, and it can do other small tasks like bringing you objects, picking up a weapon and bringing it to your hand, etc.
Lasts until killed or unsummoned (for 0 Actions) or if it goes more than 30 meters away from you.
You can communicate with it telepathically.
~Summon Familiar~.Upgrade: At Level 6, out of combat, the familiar can be invisible.
~Summon Familiar~.Notes: You can only have one summoned familiar at a time. Your familiar might have a name and personality and it might speak Common or other languages, if allowed by the QM.
~Summon Familiar~.Name: ~Summon Familiar~

~Curse of Pain~.Effect:
Declare a target.
Whenever it makes a offensive Act, it takes 4 Psychic Damage.
~Curse of Pain~.Name: ~Curse of Pain~

~Deathfire Bolt~.Effect:
Shoot a Unit with deathly fire for 1d12 + 1d10 + 1d6 Damage, Fire or Scourge (your choice).
If the target has Defense, deals 2 more Damage for each point of Defense.
~Deathfire Bolt~.Name: ~Deathfire Bolt~

~Animate Dead~.Effect:
Raise an undead Unit to fight for you from a nearby medium or larger corpse. The corpse is then consumed.
The undead Unit always has Medium size, 7 Max Health and 3 Defense.
It has Resist Checks equal to yours, but -2 to all Non-Resist Checks.
It has 4 meters movement speed.
It can use 1 Action to attack and deals 2d4 Damage (Smash, Slash or Pierce, your choice).
Your undead takes its turn immediately before or after your turn (you choose).
The undead will always try to move to and attack the closest enemy to it (you choose if it's a tie).
You can use Half-Action on your turn to command (one of) your undead to move to a certain location.
~Animate Dead~.Name: ~Animate Dead~

~Shadow Clone~.Effect:
You create an illusion of yourself at a target location.
The illusion has 1 Health and 1 Defense and it fails all Checks.
You can control what the illusion does at will.
If the illusion goes more than 10 meters away from you, it disappears and the spell is cancelled.
~Shadow Clone~.Upgrade: At Level 7, the cast range and illusion range become 15 meters and the sound of your voice can come through the illusion's mouth instead of yours. At Level 5 - 25 meters. At Level 7 you can choose to see through the illusion's eyes at any point.
~Shadow Clone~.Notes: You need maintain line of sight to the clone to keep it working.
~Shadow Clone~.Name: ~Shadow Clone~

~Resurrection~.Effect:
Touch a dead Unit, whose body is still in decent condition (as approved by the QM).
The dead Unit comes back to life, conscious and without Exhaustion, with 1 Health.
~Resurrection~.Name: ~Resurrection~

~Hand of Annihilation~.Effect: Deal 13d4 Scourge Damage to a Unit.
~Hand of Annihilation~.Name: ~Hand of Annihilation~

~Curse of Death~.Effect:
Choose a non-Epic Unit you can see.
At the start of your next Turn, it dies.
~Curse of Death~.Name: ~Curse of Death~

~Cure Affliction~.Effect: Cure a simple Disease, Debuff or Bleed effect on a Unit (you can choose yourself), or clean up to 2 rations or liters of water of microbes, mild poison or impurities.
~Cure Affliction~.Upgrade:
At Level 4, you can cure harder and stranger diseases and poisons.
At level 7, you can cure terminal or chronic diseases and poisons.
~Cure Affliction~.Notes: Debuffs are things like curses, weaknesses, etc. Crowd Control like Daze, Fumbling, Fear, Stun, etc are not considered Debuffs.
~Cure Affliction~.Name: ~Cure Affliction~

~Light~.Effect:
Create a magical light bulb that sheds light in a 3 meters radius.
It levitates and stays where you put it and can be moved by hand, or you can simply stick it to any solid object.
~Light~.Notes:
You may cancel it with 0 Actions. It can be purposefully destroyed with an Attack.
You choose the color of the light.
The light is not strong enough to blind someone.
The bulb can't go through solid objects.
~Light~.Name: ~Light~

~Solace Wave~.Effect:
Heal an ally (or yourself) for 1d8 Health.
If they have 50% or more Health before the heal, double the dice's result.
~Solace Wave~.Name: ~Solace Wave~

~Smite~.Effect:
After you roll for a melee attack, add 1d6 Divine Damage.
If the target dies, gain the Mana back.
~Smite~.Notes: If you're a Paladin, you can regain the use of Smite if the target dies.
~Smite~.Name: ~Smite~

~Burnished Flames~.Effect: Deal 2d6 + ^Charisma^ Fire Damage (ignoring Cover) and makes the target Fumbling.
~Burnished Flames~.Name: ~Burnished Flames~

~Liberation~.Effect: Instantly remove all Crowd Control from another ally you can see.
~Liberation~.Upgrade:
At Level 5, also removes all non-magical debuffs and poisons.
At Level 8, also removes all curses and normal negative magical effects.
~Liberation~.Name: ~Liberation~

~Radiance~.Effect: For 1 minute, at the end of your turn, all Units within 1 meter of you take 1d4 Divine Damage.
~Radiance~.Notes: Can't stack multiple Radiances on the same Unit.
~Radiance~.Name: ~Radiance~

~Restful Soothing~.Effect: Roll a number of d8's for each player character in your party (except yourself). Assign each rolled d8 to one player character, and heal them for their assigned die.
~Restful Soothing~.Notes: You must be staying in place to channel this and you must have the required Mana by the end of the 1 hour.
~Restful Soothing~.Name: ~Restful Soothing~

~Saving Throw~.Effect: Instantly pull another ally to your nearest empty space.
~Saving Throw~.Notes:
The ally goes flying.
You need line of sight to the targets. The allies fly to you ignoring obstacles and ground traps (goes around obstacles), unless the ally needs to swerve more than 2 meters in any direction.
~Saving Throw~.Name: ~Saving Throw~

~Guiding Bolt~.Effect:
A shining light bursts onto a Unit, dealing 2d8 + ^Sense^ Divine Damage to it.
The next time someone would cast a Spell that affects that Unit, the caster can reroll any of the spell's dice, at most one reroll for each die.
~Guiding Bolt~.Notes: This affects AoE effects and healing abilities too.
~Guiding Bolt~.Name: ~Guiding Bolt~

~Elation~.Effect: Up to 2 Player Characters you can see gain Health Regen equal to your Intelligence.
~Elation~.Name: ~Elation~

~Blinding Light~.Effect: All Units in a 4x4 meter area take 2d4 Divine Damage and are Blinded.
~Blinding Light~.Notes: Cover is calculated from the center of the area.
~Blinding Light~.Name: ~Blinding Light~

~Exorcism~.Effect:
Deal 3d10 True Damage to a Unit.
If it's a Demon, Fiend or Undead, increase the Damage by 50%.
~Exorcism~.Name: ~Exorcism~

<Golden Shield>.Effect:
A Unit you can see becomes surrounded in a divine golden shield.
Next time the Unit would take Damage, it is completely blocked.
<Golden Shield>.Name: <Golden Shield>

~Rise~.Effect:
Heal a Fallen Unit to 20% of it total Health.
It does not suffer of Exhaustion from Rising after being Fallen.
~Rise~.Name: ~Rise~

~Ardent Smite~.Effect: Add 2d4 + 1 Fire Damage to a melee weapon Attack (after you rolled the Attack). The target takes another 1d6 Fire Damage at the start of each of your next turns for 1 minute.
~Ardent Smite~.Notes: A Unit can only be affected by one Ardent Smite burn.
~Ardent Smite~.Name: ~Ardent Smite~

~Water Walk~.Effect:
Up to 2 willing Units can walk on water as normally.
The effect ends if the Unit takes Damage.
~Water Walk~.Name: ~Water Walk~

~Resurrection~.Effect:
Touch a dead Unit, whose body is still in decent condition (as approved by the QM).
The dead Unit comes back to life, conscious and without Exhaustion, with 1 Health.
~Resurrection~.Name: ~Resurrection~

~Reveling Rays~.Effect:
You shoot out 8 rays of light.
Roll 8d4 and assign them to Units within 10 meters as you with.
Each die heals on odd rolls (1 and 3) and deals Divine Damage on even rolls (2 and 4).
~Reveling Rays~.Name: ~Reveling Rays~

~Deafening Silence~.Effect: A Unit you can see takes 3d8 Psychic Damage and is Silenced.
~Deafening Silence~.Name: ~Deafening Silence~

~Wraithwalk~.Effect:
You become spectral for 10 seconds (until the start of your next turn).
While spectral, you can move through walls, objects and Units, but not through floors and ceilings.
If the effect doesn't end in an empty space, you are instantly thrown to the nearest empty space and you take 3d4 Pulse Damage.
~Wraithwalk~.Name: ~Wraithwalk~

~Read Subconscious~.Effect:
Take 10% of Max Health Damage and choose a Unit.
Pass a Sense Check against its Sense Check to understand what it's feeling right now and its intent.
~Read Subconscious~.Name: ~Read Subconscious~

~Sending~.Effect: Send a message no longer than 5 seconds long to an ally, wherever it is. It can include images, sounds and smells. That ally knows they received a message from you.
~Sending~.Upgrade: Requires you to be holding something physical from that ally, such as a piece of clothing, an object, a strand of hair, etc.
~Sending~.Notes:
Sending might be impeded if sent to another plane/world.
This is a Mysticism Spell.
~Sending~.Name: ~Sending~

~Scrying~.Effect:
You spend 10 minutes learning information about an area from a point within 100km.
You get a vision (a single snapshot) of whatever is in the line of sight from that point chosen, in any direction.
Until your next Long rest, your party ignores Hard Terrain in the scryed area.
~Scrying~.Notes:
The Quest Master decides what visions you get - you might see that area from the past, or see only the landscape without the people. An area might also be blocked by anti-scrying magic.
You only get one picture, one snapshot, one screenshot that is not moving.
This is a Mysticism Spell.
~Scrying~.Name: ~Scrying~

~Racial Transmutation~.Effect:
You spend a whole day casting this Ability with a willing ally (or by yourself). By the end of it, the race of the ally becomes changed to a chosen Plyer Character Race (from the ones allowed by the QM).
This changes the base stats and Racial Abilities of that Unit. It must also replace any Racial Feats it had with other Feats.
~Racial Transmutation~.Name: ~Racial Transmutation~
